product_name: Gerber STL 2.5 Drop Point Fine Edge Knife
long_description: The rugged little Gerber STL 2.5 Drop Point Fine Edge Knife rides comfortably in your pocket. This featherweight folding knife can accompany you almost anywhere without causing interference. STL stands for Strong, Thin and Light; weighing in at a scant 1.5 oz., this knife offers a 2.6 in. stainless-steel fine-edge blade within its solid frame-lock construction. Half-arc grooves stamped into the lower edges on each side of the handle offer steady purchase with your thumb and index finger. Cutout in the blade provides allows easy 1-handed opening. The Gerber STL 2.5 Drop Point Fine Edge Knife rides features a thin stainless-steel handle with a lanyard hole.
short_description: The rugged little Gerber STL 2.5 Drop Point Fine Edge Knife rides comfortably in your pocket. This featherweight folding knife can accompany you almost anywhere without causing interference.
